description: Cottage cheese (paneer) is cood in a thick, buttery tomato-based stew that is spiced with cumin,coriander tumeric, and a dash of garam masala
The spinach is combined and boiled with ginger, garlic, and other spices. Mixture is then enhanced with paneer cubes
Cottage cheese and bell pepper sauteed with ginger, garlic, and chili sauce or paste, prior to getting served with soy sauce, vinegar, tomato ketchup to make tangy and spciy sauce
